roommate.title: How It Works
roommate.subtitle: Finding the perfect roommate is easy with our guided process
roommate.step1Description: Choose between 'Host My Space' or 'Seek & Settle'. Then select your living plan tier: Basic, Comfort, or Elite.
roommate.step2Description: Sign up and create your detailed profile, including your lifestyle preferences, habits, and what you're looking for in a roommate.
roommate.step3Description: Browse potential roommates or properties, swipe right on profiles you like, and start conversations when you match.
roommate.step4Description: Once you've found the perfect match, arrange meetings, discuss details, and finalize your new living arrangement.
